# Timelabs

> Timelabs is a mobile app studio that builds and maintains iOS apps for personal productivity. Our apps help users track their wealth, stay informed with smart news feeds, and organize their photo memories.

## Apps

- [Bitfolio](https://bitfolio.app): Wealth portfolio tracker — track your investments, savings, and net worth across multiple accounts.
- [NewsNinja](https://ainews.ninja): Smart feed reader for RSS, Reddit, and YouTube with AI-powered summaries and filtering.
- [iStory](https://istory.timelabs.io): Device diary app — view your photos organized by the Apple device they were shot with.

## Contact

- [Email Support](mailto:support@timelabs.io): Reach us at support@timelabs.io
- [Website](https://timelabs.io): Main landing page
